mod.name: Drawing Activity Mod
mod.description: A mod that adds a new Drawing Activity skill to Stardew Valley. You can create various drawing works and participate in art exhibitions.
skill.name: Drawing Activity
skill.description: A skill for creating drawing works such as paintings and sketches.
profession.artist.name: Artist
profession.artist.description: Specialized in painting. Gain 25% additional experience when creating paintings.
profession.sculptor.name: Sculptor
profession.sculptor.description: Specialized in sculpture creation. Gain 25% additional experience when creating sculptures.
profession.master_artist.name: Master Artist
profession.master_artist.description: The highest level of painter. Painting values increase by 50%.
profession.art_critic.name: Art Critic
profession.art_critic.description: Deep understanding of art. Gain inspiration more frequently.
profession.master_sculptor.name: Master Sculptor
profession.master_sculptor.description: The highest level of sculptor. Sculpture values increase by 50%.
profession.art_dealer.name: Art Dealer
profession.art_dealer.description: Specialized in art trading. Gain additional profits when selling artworks.
items.brush.description: A brush used for creating art works.
items.chisel.description: A tool used for carving wood or stone.
artworks.landscape.description: A beautiful painting of the farm and village scenery.
artworks.still_life.description: Still life paintings of crops and tools.
artworks.magic_landscape.description: A mysterious landscape painting with magical effects.
artworks.emotion_expression.description: An abstract painting expressing specific emotions.
artworks.season_essence.description: A special painting containing the essence of each season.
artworks.stardew_soul.description: A legendary masterpiece depicting the entire village.
sculptures.plant.description: Delicate sculptures of crops and trees.
sculptures.moving.description: A mysterious sculpture that moves magically.
sculptures.emotion.description: An abstract sculpture expressing specific emotions.
sculptures.element.description: A sculpture containing the essence of fire, water, earth, and wind.
sculptures.farm_guardian.description: A legendary giant sculpture that protects the farm.
music.nature_chorus.description: Mysterious music containing the sounds of nature.
music.stardew_symphony.description: A legendary masterpiece of music depicting the entire village.
special_effects.courage_painting.descrip: A magical painting that increases attack power in combat.
special_effects.wisdom_sculpture.descrip: A magical sculpture that increases defense power in combat.
special_effects.peace_music.description: Magical music that restores health in combat.
special_effects.fishing_success.descript: Magical music that increases fishing success rate.
special_effects.foraging_painting.descri: A magical painting that increases foraging success rate.
special_effects.crop_growth.description: Magical music that accelerates crop growth.
inspiration.dawn_beauty.message: The beautiful dawn scenery inspires you.
inspiration.rain_melody.message: The sound of rain inspires you.
inspiration.snow_silence.message: The silence of snow inspires you.
inspiration.rainbow_mystery.message: A rainbow appears and inspires you!
inspiration.harvest_joy.message: You gain inspiration while harvesting crops.
inspiration.farmer_joy.message: Your first crop harvest inspires you!
inspiration.true_friendship.message: Your first NPC heart inspires you!
inspiration.harvest_joy.message: You gain inspiration while harvesting crops.

messages.daily_activities_initialized: Art Daily Activities system has been initialized!

tool.pencil_acquired: Elliott gave you a pencil as a gift! You can now create pencil drawings.
tool.paint_acquired: Leah gave you paint as a gift! You can now create watercolor paintings.
tool.advanced_acquired: Robin gave you advanced drawing tools as a gift! You can now create more complex drawings.

crafting.no_tool: Required tool not available. Build relationships with NPCs.
